segments.text: I see the boy balanced precariously on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little hand is deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's face lights up as she reaches for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing this sneaky moment together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's adorable how they're teaming up like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies look so tempting in that big jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool is leaning back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry they'll get hurt in their excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman nearby is lost in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She misses all this joyful mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing adds to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame such a sweet scene might turn bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is calm, unaware of the fun inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
